Change kernel parameters on Redhat

  1. The kernel configurations are stored in /etc/security/limits.conf
  2. Edit file 
    sudo vi /etc/security/limits.conf

    Make changes 

    notes soft nofile 65535
notes hard nofile 65535
notes soft nproc  8192
notes hard nproc  16384

    Or any changes that you mat need.

  3. Make the changes active
    sudo sysctl -p
